sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"华丽的，宏传的，辉煌的"之意。
means: splendid ： 侧重指给观察者留下壮丽辉煌或灿烂夺目的印象。
gorgeous ： 指色彩的富丽和豪华，有时含炫耀和卖弄意味。
glorious ： 指光芒四射的绚丽，也指值得称倾、赞美或扬名的壮丽辉煌。
superb ： 指壮丽辉煌、宏伟等的极点。
magnificent ： 侧重指建筑物、宝石等的华丽堂皇。

sentence.Network_en: It makes a superb filling for cakes and sponges.
sentence.Network_cn: 它非常适合做蛋糕和软布丁的馅儿。

sentence.Network_en: My wife and I discovered some superb places to eat.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和妻子发现了一些就餐的极好去处。

sentence.Network_en: There is a superb 18-hole golf course 6 miles away.
sentence.Network_cn: 6英里外有一个一流的18洞高尔夫球场。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 2): from Latin superbus 'proud, magnificent'

entry.tran: 极佳的;卓越的;质量极高的
entry.def: If something is superb, its quality is very good indeed.

example.ex: There is a superb 18-hole golf course 6 miles away...
example.tran: 6 英里外有一个一流的 18 洞高尔夫球场。

example.ex: The waters are crystal clear and offer a superb opportunity for swimming.
example.tran: 这片水域水质清澈，是游泳的绝佳场所。

entry.tran: (信心、控制力、技巧)非同一般的，超凡的
entry.def: If you say that someone has superb confidence, control, or skill, you mean that they have very great confidence, control, or skill.

example.ex: With superb skill he managed to make a perfect landing.
example.tran: 他凭借超凡的技术实现了完美着陆。

auth_sentence.content: It is a superb example of White's craft.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a superb example of White's craft.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a superb example of White's craft.

auth_sentence.content: The birds are here because of the superb fishing.
auth_sentence.res_content: The birds are here because of the superb fishing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The birds are here because of the superb fishing.

auth_sentence.content: The England women's rugby team are quite superb.
auth_sentence.res_content: The England women's rugby team are quite superb.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The England women's rugby team are quite superb.

means.word_mean: 卓越的, 杰出的, 极好的

sentences.en: The actor gave a superb performance.
His medical skill is so superb that he can hardly be filled in for an emergency.
sentences.cn: 他医术高超, 在紧急情况下几乎无人企及。

jushi.english: The actor gave a superb performance.
The sports facilities here are superb.
jushi.chinese: 这里的运动设施是第一流的。
